name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
AI Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing innovative applications with a focus on AI and machine learning. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Flask**, demonstrating strong expertise in **microservices architecture** and **event-driven architectures**. Skilled in utilizing **OpenAI APIs**, including interaction with **large language models** such as GPT, Claude, and Gemini, with experience in fine-tuning and prompt engineering to enhance performance of AI solutions.

Experienced in integrating advanced technologies such as **Kafka**, **WebSocket**, and **SSE** for real-time data processing and communication. Adept at utilizing **vector databases** like **OpenSearch** and **FAISS** for efficient data retrieval and implementing **retrieval-augmented generation** systems.

Proficient in deploying robust, scalable solutions in compliance with regulatory standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven track record in problem-solving, collaboration, and effective communication with cross-functional teams to drive successful project outcomes. Strong background in MLOps practices, incorporating CI/CD pipelines and orchestration with tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
